this is the halo falcon, it s a single piece body with a right and left engine and two landing skids, for best results use infernal robotics

the model is courtesy of no-triangle productions: [http://www.notriangle.com/falcon/](http://www.notriangle.com/falcon/)

the mod can be found on kerbalstuff here: [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1063/UH-144%20%22Falcon%22](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1063/UH-144%20%22Falcon%22) 

enjoy! 

P.S. PM me if you would like to help out with some kind of cinematic involving this and my other halo mod

Wow, interesting. The only thing I could say is you might want to retake your pictures with better lighting.

Ok, this is a really, really interesting idea.

However, the number and size of textures kind of mean that very few of these vehicles can be loaded at the same time- kind of counter-productive to using them with BDArmory, which was my first instinct when I saw this mod.![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

my primary experimenting has caused not masses of lag through just the running of the parts, it does hammer loading times quite a bit but actuall fps drop is more intrinsically linked to part count, i am still awaiting a mod that will load a duplicate damaged modelwhen the part is destroyed, rather than just vanishing i think there should be a way to load a damage model similar to the destryd buildings at ksc, not sure how you would impliment this though

Playing with this mod for a bit, the controls seem- tricky. I couldn't get the engines quite in line, and ended up skewing all over the sky. Therefore, I think that adding a pair of attachment points for the cockpit and one on each engine(thereby making them easier to attach in the right position) would be a GOOD IDEA!

Also, if there is an ability to flex the engines forward, I couldn't find it. Might prove useful.

Also, the lack of appropriate-size guns in BDArmory annoyed me somewhat ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

the tilt rotor system does need infernal robotics, i intend to learn bd armory, i have the gun model all ready but need to learn how to name stuff, i tend to use off set and the cot and com indicatoes to get the trust balanced
